original_title: Ukrainian arrested in Italy over Nord Stream sabotage – German prosecutors — RT World News
article_summary: ICE deletes posts about deporting Ukrainians during Zelensky's visit to Washington, amidst ongoing discussions about peace between Ukraine and Russia. The posts, which contained photos of deportees, were part of Trump's crackdown on illegal immigration. The US is also facing setbacks in its plan to build a naval drone fleet, due to technical issues and management turmoil.</s>
